snippet.title: Monster Hunter Dynamic Hunting Trailer
snippet.description:
Monster Hunter Dynamic Hunting for iPhone and iPod available now on iTunes! Price  : $4.99 
Require OS : iOS 4.1 or better
Require device : iPhone 3GS / iPhone 4
    iPod touch 3rd or more
Game Feature : 
*Optimize for the iPhone experience with dynamic gesture input.
*Bluetooth co-operative mode up to Two People that allows users to 
hunt together for epic beasts.
*Player Customization (13 armors and 3 types of weapons (40 weapons in total).
